name: My Pixel Playground
description:
Warning: Pressing R will restart the game

My Pixel Playground lets you build the playground of your dreams!

The Town Council just got the funds for a new playground and they've hired you to build it! Meet the requirements from the town to earn money and make your park the best around! 

Features:

  • Over 10 pixel art rides including slides, swings, jungle Jim's and more! 
  • Tons of scenery to decorate your park
  • Unlock new items as you progress

This project was made for #wonderjam 2022 in under 10 days. 

Art/Programming: rsvp asap

Music: wyver9,  Avgvst

SFX: SubspaceAudio, shiru8bit
